text.autoconfig.tp_utils.title: TP Utils Config
text.autoconfig.tp_utils.option.tpThroug: From how far should the mod be able to detect blocks to TP through
text.autoconfig.tp_utils.option.tpOnTopR: From how far should the mod be able to detect blocks to TP onto
text.autoconfig.tp_utils.option.tpForwar: The amount of blocks you'll TP forward
text.autoconfig.tp_utils.option.allowCra: Allow the mod to teleport you into a 1 block high space
text.autoconfig.tp_utils.option.setBedro: Stop the mod from teleporting you below bedrock / the bottom world limit
